Title: Selfless
Plot: Anya grants a young woman's wish, but the violent and deadly act of vengeance leaves Anya completely guilt-ridden. In order to fix her mistake, she asks that the spell be undone. Knowing the price of the reversal is the life of a Vengeance Demon, she's willing to make the sacrifice.
GuestStars: Marti Noxon, Abraham Benrubi, Andy Umberger, Joyce Guy, Jennifer Shon, Taylor Sutherland, Marybeth Sherr, Alessandro Mastrobuono, Daniel Spanton, John Timmons, David Fury
